name: Habits 2.0 ft. Notion Buttons
description: Habits 2.0 is a comprehensive habit tracker template designed for Notion, featuring advanced tracking features to help you monitor your progress and achieve your goals.What's Included:An easy-to-use interface that lets you quickly add and track your daily habitsAn "All Check Today" button feature that lets you check all your habits for today in a single clickHabits Stats section that shows you the overall progress, daily progress, monthly progress, and progress of each of your habitsA customizab
features: An easy-to-use interface that lets you quickly add and track your daily habits; An "All Check Today" button feature that lets you check all your habits for today in a single click; Habits Statssection that shows you the overall progress, daily progress, monthly progress, and progress of each of your habits; A customizable dashboard that allows you to tailor the tracker to your individual needs and preferences; Anyone looking to improve their habits, whether it's for fitness, productivity, or personal development; Individuals who want to track their daily routines and stay motivated towards their goals; Anyone who wants to integrate habit tracking into their Notion workspace and streamline their daily routine
